column4: Anybody succeeded in getting the Broadcom 4311 wireless card to work ?
yes, did it last night actually
hold on, i still have the exact instructions i used
used the fwcutter and yanked the windows firmware
please find them ... I've been trying to get it working for a month now
you used ndiswrapper or the kernel module ?
apt-get fwcutter, use the program on the windows driver...restarted, and BAM
if it doesn't work on the first try, try the alternative drivers he lists, i ended up having to use a driver that did NOT come with my notebook
is this the driver you've used R115321.EXE ?
